mysql.mysql_handler.query.message: Error 500: Internal server error - MySQL database service encountered an unexpected error while processing query
Error 503: Service unavailable - The MySQL database service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Error 408: Request timeout - The SQL query execution timed out. Please try again with a more optimized query.
Error 429: Rate limit exceeded - You have exceeded the maximum number of database queries allowed. Please try again later.
Error 403: Access denied - Insufficient privileges to execute this query. Required database permissions missing.
Error 500: System error - Operating system error occurred during database operation. Please contact system administrator.

mysql.mysql_handler.get_resources_list.message: Error 500: Internal server error - MySQL database service encountered an unexpected error while retrieving database schema
Error 503: Service unavailable - The MySQL database service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Error 408: Request timeout - The database schema retrieval request timed out. Please try again.
Error 429: Rate limit exceeded - You have exceeded the maximum number of schema listing requests allowed. Please try again later.
Error 403: Access denied - Insufficient privileges to list database schemas. Required read permissions missing.
Error 500: System error - Operating system error occurred while accessing database metadata. Please contact system administrator.

mysql.mysql_handler.get_resource.message: Error 500: Internal server error - MySQL database service encountered an unexpected error while retrieving table schema
Error 503: Service unavailable - The MySQL database service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Error 408: Request timeout - The table schema retrieval request timed out. Please try again.
Error 429: Rate limit exceeded - You have exceeded the maximum number of schema retrieval requests allowed. Please try again later.
Error 403: Access denied - Insufficient privileges to access this database table. Required read permissions missing.
Error 500: System error - Operating system error occurred while accessing table metadata. Please contact system administrator.
